author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Gets the documentation of all BPA checks.
commands.name: pan-os-get-documentation

commands.description: Submits a job to the BPA job queue. PAN-OS devices with large configuration files may take a few minutes for the job to be submitted.
commands.name: pan-os-bpa-submit-job

commands.description: Returns the results of the BPA job.
commands.name: pan-os-bpa-get-job-results

integration.description: Palo Alto Networks Best Practice Assessment (BPA) analyzes NGFW and Panorama configurations and compares them to the best practices.
integration.name: Palo Alto Networks BPA

playbook.description: This playbook runs the Palo Alto Best Practice Assessment checks for a PAN-OS instance.
playbook.name: Run Panorama Best Practice Assessment

playbook.description:
Comprehensive version for PAN-OS Best Practice Assessment Report which fetches the BPA report zipped file, unzips it, rasterises the PDF, and visualizes the data in the custom Best Practice Assessment incident layout.
You have the option to email the report via the playbook inputs.
playbook.name: Comprehensive PAN-OS Best Practice Assessment

description: Palo Alto Networks Best Practice Assessment (BPA) analyzes NGFW and Panorama configurations and compares them to the best practices.
name: Best Practice Assessment (BPA) by Palo Alto Networks (Deprecated)
